borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Works are within Communal gardens:14a Pyracantha - fell; 16a Laburnum - fell; 19 Holm Oak - fell; 20 Holm Oak - fell; 21a Laburnum - fell; 23a Laburnum - fell;23b Laburnum - fell; 24 Holly - fell; 25a Laburnum - fell; 25b Laburnum - fell; 25c Laburnum - fell; 27a Laburnum - fell;28a Laburnum - fell; 33 Laburnum - fell; G35a Laburnum x 6 - fell; 39a Laburnum - fell; 41a Laburnum - fell; 42a Laburnum - fell;42b Laburnum - fell; G48a Laburnum x 4 - fell; 52a Laburnum - fell; 52b Laburnum - fell; REASON FOR FELLS = to allow for excavation and new railings to be built - To facilitate restoration and reinstatement of the original historic garden layout and railings around the inner border/ path edge - to remove moribund random and unplanned planting and allow for revitalised and appropriate planting at the boundary to reinvigorate the signature London Planes in the boundary beds.
